comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: 2 February 1944: things get out of hand for aviation cadet William E. Davis, Jr at the controls of BT-13A serial 42-1622 when he lost control on landing at Courtland Army Air Field, AL and collided with another Vultee.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
